Sentencas: The use of nickel-yttria-stabilized zirconia (Ni/YSZ) as anode material for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) applications, presents some limitations such as poor stability in reduction/oxidation cycling, and poor sulphur tolerance which results in carbon deposition when utilizing hydrocarbon fuels.
Titulo: Effects of doping by copper on electrical properties of LaCrO3 based perovskite

Sentencas: Even though lanthanum chromite (LaCrO3 noted LCO) is an excellent alternative to Ni/YSZ, it is rarely used in SOFC applications due to its poor conductivity.
Titulo: Effects of doping by copper on electrical properties of LaCrO3 based perovskite

Sentencas: In order to further progress in developing LCO materials, this work was conducted to improve the conductivity of LCO by copper doping.
Titulo: Effects of doping by copper on electrical properties of LaCrO3 based perovskite

Sentencas: In particular, LaCr1-xCuxO3 compounds with x = 0, 0.1, and 0.3 were synthesized via a solid-solid method.
Titulo: Effects of doping by copper on electrical properties of LaCrO3 based perovskite

Sentencas: The followed preparation process allows obtaining a cubic structure with Pm-3m space group.
Titulo: Effects of doping by copper on electrical properties of LaCrO3 based perovskite

Sentencas: The substitution of Cr with Cu resulted in a slight increase in lattice parameter a, but no change in structure or space group.
Titulo: Effects of doping by copper on electrical properties of LaCrO3 based perovskite

Sentencas: Whereas, the band gap energy decreased from 3.68 eV for x = 0-3.06 eV for x = 0.3.
Titulo: Effects of doping by copper on electrical properties of LaCrO3 based perovskite

Sentencas: The crystallite size increases with doping level.
Titulo: Effects of doping by copper on electrical properties of LaCrO3 based perovskite

Sentencas: With regard to the obtained data from electrical measurements, a thermally activated and frequency depended conductivity was obtained for all samples.
Titulo: Effects of doping by copper on electrical properties of LaCrO3 based perovskite

Sentencas: Furthermore, the correlated barrier hopping mechanism was proposed as a conduction mechanism, and an electrical transition from semiconductor to metallic behavior was observed.
Titulo: Effects of doping by copper on electrical properties of LaCrO3 based perovskite

Sentencas: The conductivity increased also monotonously with Cu content and shows a maximum value of 4.5 S/m for x = 0.3.
Titulo: Effects of doping by copper on electrical properties of LaCrO3 based perovskite

Sentencas: Besides, the tangent loss shows a maximum value of around 10(4) for x = 0.1.
Titulo: Effects of doping by copper on electrical properties of LaCrO3 based perovskite

Sentencas: The LaCr0.7Cu0.3O3 compound could be a good candidate for SOFC applications, while LaCr0.9 Cu0.1O3 can be used as a heating element.
Titulo: Effects of doping by copper on electrical properties of LaCrO3 based perovskite
